amendment.description: Amendment provides for a $2.8 million increase in funding for Tax Counseling for the Elderly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for taxpayer services at IRS by $2.8 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Grayson.
